conclusion: Determine shadow changes based on light source movement
Shadow A is cast to the left of the apple
Shadow B is cast to the left of the paper
Shadow C is cast to the left of the glass
Shadow D is cast to the left of the bone
Light source moves to the back right
Shadows will shift to the front left
Shadows may become longer due to oblique angle
Shadow A will move to the front left of the apple and may become longer
Shadow B will move to the front left of the paper and may become longer
Shadow C will move to the front left of the glass and may become longer
Shadow D will move to the front left of the bone and may become longer
All shadows will shift to the front left and may become longer
Final answer: Shadows will shift to the front left and may become longer
